titleStmt.title: The dying Christians friendly advice[.] To sinners all, and every Christian friend, this my advice I freely recommend. And with them all while they have time and brea[th] to make provision for to meet with death. To the tune of, Aim not too high. This may be printed, R.L.S.

The dying Christians friendly advice[.] To sinners all, and every Christian friend, this my advice I freely recommend. And with them all while they have time and brea[th] to make provision for to meet with death. To the tune of, Aim not too high. This may be printed, R.L.S.

notesStmt.note: Verse: "You mortal men who vainly spend your youth ..."
L copy tightly bound and trimmed affecting imprint.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
